songs.title: Hold Me Down
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Hold
Hold me yuh
Hold me down
Hold me down, never slow me down
Hold me down, never slow me down
Hold me down, never slow me down
Hold me down, never slow me down
Hold me down

[Chorus]
Hold me down, never slow me down
Pour me up, like double cup
Hold me down, never let you down
[?], never slow it up
Hold me down, never slow me down
Pour me up, like double cup
Hold me down, never slow it down
[?], like yuh yuh

[Verse 1]
Hold up, hold up
No more slower, no more slower
Liquor soda in my cup
Yuh
Liquor soda, add some [?]
We gon go up
Yuh
We gon go up
We gon blow up, we gon blow up
Everything I do too heat
Yeah
Everything I do on fleek
Yeah
You don't even really smoke weed
Yuh
But you prolly spark with me
Yeah drugs

[Chorus]
Hold me down, never slow me down
Pour me up, like double cup
Hold me down, never let you down
[?], never slow it up
Hold me down, never slow me down
Pour me up, like double cup
Hold me down, never let you down
[?], never slow it up
Never slow it up
Yeah, yeah

[Verse 2]
Drugs on drugs, hoes on hoes
Fuck you mean, pull up at liquor store
Distort drums, distressed jeans
I'm off lean and Hennessey
Drugs ain't free, cost a lot
Bought that all, pills I pop
Different drugs, different highs
Different day, different night
Two girls, one time yeah yeah
Sound like a fun time yeah yeah
Bread is all on me yeah yeah
Who that dumb [?] yeah yeah
Who
Yeah yeah
Who
Yeah yeah
Groove
Yeah yeah
Move
Yeah yeah

[Chorus]
Hold me down, never slow me down
Pour me up, like double cup
Hold me down, never let you down
[?], never slow it up

[Outro]
Never slow it up
Never slow it up
Never slow it up
Just pour me up
Just pour me up
Just pour me up
Just pour me up
Yuh
